example.description: This command creates a reusable delegation set of 4 name servers that can be resused by multiple hosted zones.

example.code:
New-R53ReusableDelegationSet -HostedZoneId Z38AAAS6E26EZR -CallerReference testcaller1
DelegationSet Location ------------- -------- Amazon.Route53.Model.DelegationSet https://route53.amazonaws.com/2013-04-01/delegationset/N4LO1MZ0FAA2L
example.description: This command marks the delegation set for an existing hosted zone as reusable.
